synopsis.text:
Ever since the untimely death of their parents, Ryo Mizuhara and his younger sister, Akane, have been living a content and ordinary life, until an unexpected turn of events disrupts their tranquility. The Japanese government, in an attempt to combat the plummeting birth rates, has initiated a clandestine project that forces two young individuals into matrimony. Ryo becomes the unwilling participant in this experiment, as his new fiancée, Shizuka Masuda, arrives at his doorstep one fateful night, accompanied by an entourage of government-issued bodyguards.

Shizuka, an enthusiastic and enigmatic girl, is more than eager to embrace her new role as Ryo's wife, despite his vehement objections. As she settles into their home, Ryo finds himself overwhelmed by the intrusion of meddlesome friends, persistent bodyguards, and his overzealous fiancée. The young man's life takes an unexpected detour, leaving him to navigate through the chaos of his newfound circumstances. Will Ryo be able to preserve his sanity and cherished bachelor lifestyle amidst the whirlwind of events that have been thrust upon him?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
